readability_reflection: Probably interpolation, because of the {}, it makes it more readable when you have a big string what'll be output if its surrounded by {} and not ""
comprehension_debugging: I would say it impacted my ability in terms of how quickly I could understand it, as I have to pay more attention to where the "" marks are
preference_rationale: the {} made me choose interpolation as its more readable when im coding and can spend a few minutes looking at it and understanding it as appose to string concatenation
learning_curve: I've worked with C++ and Python so string concatenation is something i'm more familiar with as I had a lot of assignments in my entry level classes using string concatenation.
suggestions_improvement: good question, I think changing the syntax of string concatenation can be a little annoying if you're new to programming. It's specifically the quotation marks because you typically enclose a message within "" marks so I think changing it to a different symbol might be better.
